name: Alpine Paradise
description: Nestled in the Austrian Alps, this campsite offers breathtaking mountain views and direct access to hiking trails. Perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers.

name: Mediterranean Dreams
description: Beautiful beachside camping with modern facilities. Enjoy the sun, sea, and Spanish culture just minutes from Barcelona's city center.

name: Black Forest Camp
description: Traditional German camping experience surrounded by the legendary Black Forest. Family-friendly with excellent amenities.
